info.name: gk_startup
info.author: GavickPro
info.desc: Image Show GK4 style for the Startup template.

field.name: image_bg
field.label: Image background color
field.desc: Slide image background as hexdecimal value

field.name: quality
field.label: Image quality
field.desc: Quality of images (used in the JPG images) - percentage value between 0 and 100.

field.name: desktop_width
field.label: Desktop width
field.desc: This dimension will be used for the arrows positioning

field.name: image_width
field.label: Image width
field.desc: Slide image width in pixels in the desktop mode

field.name: module_height
field.label: Module height
field.desc: Module block height in the desktop mode

field.name: tablet_width
field.label: Tablet width
field.desc: Minimal width when the tablet mode will be enabled

field.name: tablet_image_width
field.label: Image width
field.desc: Slide image width in pixels in the tablet mode

field.name: tablet_module_height
field.label: Module height
field.desc: Module block height in the tablet mode

field.name: mobile_width
field.label: Mobile width
field.desc: Minimal width when the mobile mode will be enabled

field.name: mobile_image_width
field.label: Mobile image width
field.desc: Slide image width in pixels in the mobile mode

field.name: mobile_module_height
field.label: Mobile module height
field.desc: Module block height in the mobile mode

field.name: pagination
field.label: Pagination
field.desc: You can enable showing pagination interface at the bottom of the module.

field.name: arrows
field.label: Arrows
field.desc: You can enable showing arrows interface (prev/next buttons).

field.name: slide_links
field.label: Slide links
field.desc: You can enable links in the slides.
